Title: Wittgenstein An Introduction
Author: Joachim Schulte
Translator: William H. Brenner and John F. Holley
Publisher: State University of New York Press
Notes: Chatper 2 focuses on the Tractatus. 'How to read the Tractatus. Philosophy. World. Signs. Analysis and Picture. Saying and Show - Logic. Limits.' Very critical of perceived contradictions in the Tractatus.
